name: Anno 1503 A.D.
description: Installs the gold version of the game with the DVD-ROM.
content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/game/ANNO 1503/1503Startup.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing...
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: windowmanagermanaged=n
    description: Setting up winetricks...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
system:
  reset_desktop: true
wine:
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
